data.actual_result: If you're really fast enough, you see a 20 seconds countdown at first and then the 24 hour countdown starts.
data.expected_result: The invite shows a 24 hour countdown.
data.short_description: When you create a new server and jump into Server settings>Instant invites within the first 20 seconds, the countdown is a bit strange [Android 5.x specific]
data.steps_to_repro: - Quickly jump into Server settings>Instant invites. Observe the countdown.
